articles.title: Study Warns: Carbon Dioxide Removal Methods Could Trigger Ocean Oxygen Crisis - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: Marine carbon dioxide removal methods could dangerously accelerate ocean oxygen depletion.

articles.title: 2 killed and 32 injured after a bridge collapses at a tourist destination in western India - AP News
